item.title: A new way to look at Categories in Hugo Blogs
item.description: This site is build through blogdown, which is a marvellous little R package that integrates Hugo sites into a R workflow. A nice thing about Hugo sites are the large number of themes available to quickly integrate with your site to change the vibe. My theme is mostly just a recolored version of the hello-friend-ng theme, using catppuccin for the colors. My only gripe with the theme is that it uses a default list for all types of content.
